channel.title: tips on Everyday I Learn
channel.description: Recent content in tips on Everyday I Learn

item.title: Autofix ESLint Issue on Webstrom 2016
item.description: Currently, I and my team are working on a Javascript application using NodeJS and ReactJS. We use ESLint to use a coding standard with AirBnB config. We’re satisfied with it so far.

item.title: How I Transfer My Files From Mac Osx El Capitan to Ubuntu 14 04
item.description: Today I want to transfer all of my data from my office’s MacBook Air (El-Capitan) to my laptop (Ubuntu 14.04). Since two of my external hard disk are broken, I need another way to transfer those files. And I come with transferring using the network (I have a wifi router at home).
